list.name: Default
list.comment: Added capability to record in blocks removed autoconnect setting removed 'only sylvac devices' setting

property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: STATE_ON PSI JAVA://android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter#STATE_ON BluetoothR FILE file://C:/Android Projects/SylvacMeasurements/app/src/main/java/com/patrick/Sylvac_Calipers/BluetoothReceiver.java writeCh PSI JAVA://android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#writeCharacteristic

task.summary:
----- Res Files -----
New: Added "Scan" button to the menu, triggers a new BluetoothLeScan for 10 seconds if there is no scan running Added extra section to the Status layout for device info Added extra text field in the bluetooth_device layout for device address Included icon for the scan button
Updated: Changed some ID's in the bluetooth_device layout to reflect content
----- Java Files -----
BluetoothLeGattCallback: onCharacteristicChanged broadcasts the data via Connectionmanager instead of firing off the measurement received intent. onDescriptorWrite: - Added broadcast to notify when the bond is complete ('complete' meaning that data can be received from the calipers) onServicesDiscovered changed to call the Connectionmanager with a flag: = true when service discovery complete.
BluetoothReceiver: Added a ConnectionManager to allow access to the MainActivity for local broadcast. - includes 'set' function for updating existing ConnectionManagers. Updated to use the CommunicationCharacteristics interface for action and key values Now broadcasts an Intent containing the measurement to be received by the DataReceiver BroadcastReceiver for handling.
CommunicationCharacteristics: Abstracted variables from multiple classes for conformity
ConnectFragment: Added internal Runnable class that performs a 'Toast' given a message and duration. Updated BluetoothReceiver to set ConnectionManager Application now exits if no BT adapter found BluetoothScanner now defined in onCreate instead of onResume so it is only created once. Toast is now made with Device name when connecting to a device Update device bond status when unpairing. LongClick now returns true so onClick isn't fired. Tries to activate BT on resume if not enabled. DeviceAdapter now defined in onResume along with retrieval of bonded devices. Now checks if scan is running before starting a scan Scan has a timeout of 10 seconds via delayed runnable If user does not re-enable BT application exits Flags for connecting to a device now implemented. Set device address in ConnectionManager Callback is now defined each time a new connection is attempted Updated intentFilter to use values from CommunicationCharacteristics interface. Scan results processed on main UI Thread Changed check for Sylvac device to use startsWith instead of pattern match
ConnectionManager: Added function to extract a given characteristic for modulation. Added internal Notifier class that enables the Notification setting in a seperate thread. Added function for setting the device address Now has a check if all services are discovered before enabling indication, re-opens the connection if false; Fixed issue with byte data returning invalid string ((byte)13 dropped from the end) Can now set local BluetoothGatt device via set function Re-wrote enableIndication/Notification functions to use getChar function
DataReceiver: Now plays a beep noise on value received, based on the preference value. Current record ID is now stored in prefs for persistence/
DeviceAdapter: Updated to handle layout having text view for device address
MainActivity: Fragments are now held in global variables. Exits if BLE support fails. Added MediaPlayer for DataReceiver Now handles scan icon in menu, fires connect frag scan function. Added call to start media player
RecordFragment: Updated adding of record to use the ID from prefs.

Changed minSDK to 21 (5.0.1) to accomadate older devices. - 6.0 devices have an issue with re-bonding
Set the keyboard display for MainActivity to 'adjustPan' as it was hiding the text input for record ID. Removed the Preference for enabling record editing (un implemented). Added XML file for the Help (FAQ and troubleshooting) information. Removed the 'About' menu item (un implemented)
Modified the Record layout: - removed the grey background from current ID section. - added a seperator line between record list and current ID section.
Added List to hold the help topics in Help Fragment. Added XML layout file for the individual help topics.
Added change listener to the settings fragment: - updates the summary for "Values per entry" to contain the current value.
RecordFragment: -removed the similation of receiving a measurement.
New instance of the media player created for each 'beep' Added Help Activity to manage the reading of help topics from xml and displaying in the list. Changed data receiver to use char version of space, UI was removing extra whitespace.
Removed unsued 'writeCharacteristic' function
Added handling of device disconnecting, with user notification and resetting via connectionmanager. Device is updated with bonded status inplace rather than clearing the list and scanning for bonded devices as this was not displaying the new bond. btReceiver in ConnectFragment now receives GATT_DISCONNECTED intent for handling deive disconnection.
Added notificatoin for when scanning times out. Bonded devices are loaded in onCreate for initial population.
Changed the width for the record ID to accomadate 3digit IDs.
Screen now stays on if the app is open.
Fixed crash on autorotate. Added in a dummy send option in the menu for testing purposes

Autosave data is complete, with toggle in settings plus file name setting. Data is appended to the file. Autosave is handled when a record is completed, preference is checked each output for filename. if the filename is changed in between records the next record will be output to the new file. If the file is non existent then it is created.
Fixed the issue with the width of the measurements section in single_record layout.
Swapped out ConnectFragment for DeviceListFragment: makes it easier to handle onClick events for a list.

Have a recheck to make sure the indication value is set, otherwise rety the connection (timeout based) Implemented preference change listener in the recordfragment to check when the value_per_entry preference is changed, now resets the current record to empty and resets the measurement count. updated the record preview to have 2 lines (max 8 measurements displayed)
Fixed issue with receiving multiple measurements, replaced ACTION_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED code with 'disconnect()'

First time connection now works with unbonded devices - previous attempts to transmit data resulted in 'no_data' displayed on the calipers. updated info messages on the Scan page to properly reflect connection status.

Added a connection attempt limit for each new connection, this stops an infinite loops with being disconnected from the remote device. Added the feature of completely disconnecting from the device and refreshing the cache if service discovery times out; changed from 2s to 10s. Extracted the register BondStateReceiver to its own function so it can be called publicly. This allows for the receiver to be registered upon attempting a new connection. Added an extra filter for the menu option 'Disconnect device' so the BroadcastReceiver now handles this action. Renamed 'Record' class to be 'DataRecord'
Renamed the Fragment titles to 'Scan' and 'Data' to better reflect their purpose. Updated the content of the FAQ and Troubleshooting section.

Cleaned up the connection manager: - removed a lot of uneccessary connection garbage (notify / timeouts etc) - more informative connection status details - added title bar status - moved all connection broadcast receivers to the Connection manager class.
TODO: - potentially add timeouts, - update help info in the menu - unit testing
Added a MediaScan on files to refresh the MTP, only works on NEW files. appending still requires a phone restart.
Added capability to record in blocks removed autoconnect setting removed 'only sylvac devices' setting

MESSAGE.value:
----- Res Files -----
New: Added "Scan" button to the menu, triggers a new BluetoothLeScan for 10 seconds if there is no scan running Added extra section to the Status layout for device info Added extra text field in the bluetooth_device layout for device address Included icon for the scan button
Updated: Changed some ID's in the bluetooth_device layout to reflect content
----- Java Files -----
BluetoothLeGattCallback: onCharacteristicChanged broadcasts the data via Connectionmanager instead of firing off the measurement received intent. onDescriptorWrite: - Added broadcast to notify when the bond is complete ('complete' meaning that data can be received from the calipers) onServicesDiscovered changed to call the Connectionmanager with a flag: = true when service discovery complete.
BluetoothReceiver: Added a ConnectionManager to allow access to the MainActivity for local broadcast. - includes 'set' function for updating existing ConnectionManagers. Updated to use the CommunicationCharacteristics interface for action and key values Now broadcasts an Intent containing the measurement to be received by the DataReceiver BroadcastReceiver for handling.
CommunicationCharacteristics: Abstracted variables from multiple classes for conformity
ConnectFragment: Added internal Runnable class that performs a 'Toast' given a message and duration. Updated BluetoothReceiver to set ConnectionManager Application now exits if no BT adapter found BluetoothScanner now defined in onCreate instead of onResume so it is only created once. Toast is now made with Device name when connecting to a device Update device bond status when unpairing. LongClick now returns true so onClick isn't fired. Tries to activate BT on resume if not enabled. DeviceAdapter now defined in onResume along with retrieval of bonded devices. Now checks if scan is running before starting a scan Scan has a timeout of 10 seconds via delayed runnable If user does not re-enable BT application exits Flags for connecting to a device now implemented. Set device address in ConnectionManager Callback is now defined each time a new connection is attempted Updated intentFilter to use values from CommunicationCharacteristics interface. Scan results processed on main UI Thread Changed check for Sylvac device to use startsWith instead of pattern match
ConnectionManager: Added function to extract a given characteristic for modulation. Added internal Notifier class that enables the Notification setting in a seperate thread. Added function for setting the device address Now has a check if all services are discovered before enabling indication, re-opens the connection if false; Fixed issue with byte data returning invalid string ((byte)13 dropped from the end) Can now set local BluetoothGatt device via set function Re-wrote enableIndication/Notification functions to use getChar function
DataReceiver: Now plays a beep noise on value received, based on the preference value. Current record ID is now stored in prefs for persistence/
DeviceAdapter: Updated to handle layout having text view for device address
MainActivity: Fragments are now held in global variables. Exits if BLE support fails. Added MediaPlayer for DataReceiver Now handles scan icon in menu, fires connect frag scan function. Added call to start media player
RecordFragment: Updated adding of record to use the ID from prefs.

Changed minSDK to 21 (5.0.1) to accomadate older devices. - 6.0 devices have an issue with re-bonding
Set the keyboard display for MainActivity to 'adjustPan' as it was hiding the text input for record ID. Removed the Preference for enabling record editing (un implemented). Added XML file for the Help (FAQ and troubleshooting) information. Removed the 'About' menu item (un implemented)
Modified the Record layout: - removed the grey background from current ID section. - added a seperator line between record list and current ID section.
Added List to hold the help topics in Help Fragment. Added XML layout file for the individual help topics.
Added change listener to the settings fragment: - updates the summary for "Values per entry" to contain the current value.
RecordFragment: -removed the similation of receiving a measurement.
New instance of the media player created for each 'beep' Added Help Activity to manage the reading of help topics from xml and displaying in the list. Changed data receiver to use char version of space, UI was removing extra whitespace.
Removed unsued 'writeCharacteristic' function
Added handling of device disconnecting, with user notification and resetting via connectionmanager. Device is updated with bonded status inplace rather than clearing the list and scanning for bonded devices as this was not displaying the new bond. btReceiver in ConnectFragment now receives GATT_DISCONNECTED intent for handling deive disconnection.
Added notificatoin for when scanning times out. Bonded devices are loaded in onCreate for initial population.
Changed the width for the record ID to accomadate 3digit IDs.
New branch commit
Screen now stays on if the app is open.
Fixed crash on autorotate. Added in a dummy send option in the menu for testing purposes
WIP on autosave data

Autosave data is complete, with toggle in settings plus file name setting. Data is appended to the file. Autosave is handled when a record is completed, preference is checked each output for filename. if the filename is changed in between records the next record will be output to the new file. If the file is non existent then it is created.
Fixed the issue with the width of the measurements section in single_record layout.
Inital commit for Nexus 5 branch
End of week push// 30.9.2016
Swapped out ConnectFragment for DeviceListFragment: makes it easier to handle onClick events for a list.
Fixed issue with calipers sending data and no 'beep' occuring.

Have a recheck to make sure the indication value is set, otherwise rety the connection (timeout based) Implemented preference change listener in the recordfragment to check when the value_per_entry preference is changed, now resets the current record to empty and resets the measurement count. updated the record preview to have 2 lines (max 8 measurements displayed)
Synchronization commit
Fixed issue with receiving multiple measurements, replaced ACTION_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED code with 'disconnect()'

First time connection now works with unbonded devices - previous attempts to transmit data resulted in 'no_data' displayed on the calipers. updated info messages on the Scan page to properly reflect connection status.

Added a connection attempt limit for each new connection, this stops an infinite loops with being disconnected from the remote device. Added the feature of completely disconnecting from the device and refreshing the cache if service discovery times out; changed from 2s to 10s. Extracted the register BondStateReceiver to its own function so it can be called publicly. This allows for the receiver to be registered upon attempting a new connection. Added an extra filter for the menu option 'Disconnect device' so the BroadcastReceiver now handles this action. Renamed 'Record' class to be 'DataRecord'
Renamed the Fragment titles to 'Scan' and 'Data' to better reflect their purpose. Updated the content of the FAQ and Troubleshooting section.

Cleaned up the connection manager: - removed a lot of uneccessary connection garbage (notify / timeouts etc) - more informative connection status details - added title bar status - moved all connection broadcast receivers to the Connection manager class.
TODO: - potentially add timeouts, - update help info in the menu - unit testing
Added a MediaScan on files to refresh the MTP, only works on NEW files. appending still requires a phone restart.
Added capability to record in blocks removed autoconnect setting removed 'only sylvac devices' setting

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added capability to record in blocks removed autoconnect setting removed 'only sylvac devices' setting
